about_the_game:
Tsar Ivan the Terrible has ordered the construction of a cathedral in honor of his military victories. Many teams of builders will take part in the construction, but only one of them will stand out and gain the favor of the Tsar!

The Red Cathedral: Digital Edition is a faithful adaptation of the acclaimed board game. It is a game of strategy and resource management, where you take on the role of a team of architects charged with building the cathedral. You will compete to build different parts of the monument that you will previously claim. You will search for and manage materials that you will later use to build and decorate. You must take into account the influence of the clergy and the different guilds of the city to stand out from the rest and win the favor of the Tsar. Upon completion of the cathedral, the player who has gained the most prestige will be the winner!

Build alone, with friends, or with strangers!

Choose your favorite way to play, either solo or against other players. The Red Cathedral: Digital Edition offers cross-platform multiplayer, where you can invite friends – locally or online – or challenge random players. If you prefer to play alone, you have two options: face the AI ​​on various difficulty levels or take on the challenge of beating the original board game’s Automa.

A unique AI

We have developed a specific AI for the official game. Play with all the excitement of a normal game, without the need to wait for anyone! Choose between three difficulty levels to enjoy your games.

Cross-platform strategy and fun!

The Red Cathedral: Digital Edition is available on:

  • PC or Steam Deck via Steam

  • iTunes for iOS phones and tablets

  • Google Play for Android phones and tablets

💡 An original game from the minds of Shei & Isra!

♟️ Great strategic depth!

🎨 Adapted and expanded art from the board game!

🤖 Three levels of AI to play solo!

⚙️ Challenge against the official board game’s Automa!

🧐 Includes a detailed, step-by-step tutorial!

🧠 Easy to learn, hard to master!

♾️ Nearly unlimited replayability!

🌐 Local and online multiplayer!

👩‍💻 Cross-platform competition!

⏳ Synchronous and asynchronous game modes!

🎲 A board game with the convenience of a digital platform!

short_description: The Red Cathedral is a fun turn-based strategy game for 1 to 4 players. Manage your resources well to build the cathedral better than anyone else and thus win the Tsar's favor.
